Item.Title: James Earl Jones: The Un-Conventional Guest Star
Item.Description: When silver screen titan James Earl Jones made a guest appearance on BBT, everyone knew it was going to be a blast, but no one suspected the man behind Darth Vader's voice would be laughing the hardest!

Item.Title: The Big Cendrowski: Backstage with the Collest Director and Cast in the Universe
Item.Description: Series director Mark Cendrowski takes the audience on a guided tour of the non-stop action he and the cast endure every week while filming The Big Bang Theory.

Item.Title: The Big Bang Theory's May the 4th
Item.Description: In honor of Star Wars Day, BBT enists the help of legendary FX studio Industrial Light and Magic to imbue Professor Proton (Bob Newhard) with the powers of a Jedi Master.
